item.title: Building and shipping Hugo posts with Travis CI for Github Pages
item.description: Since my blog source code is private, this blog post contains snippets of how I set up Travis CI to build and push Hugo’s public folder to another repository that hosts my public Github Pages. Configuring Travis CI .travis.yml --- install: - curl -LO https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.59.1/hugo_0.59.1_Linux-64bit.deb - sudo dpkg -i hugo_0.59.1_Linux-64bit.deb script: - git submodule init - git submodule update - hugo - rm -Rf .
